content: This article provides homeowners with a comprehensive overview of progress payments under the NSW HIA Lump Sum contract and payment schedule requirements. It covers frequently asked questions such as progress claim vs payment claim, how progress claims work, and how progress payments are calculated. The article also explains the progress claim process, security of payment progress claim, and final progress claim, followed by the standard progress payment schedule in NSW and the role of the Security of Payment Act in regulating progress payments.
